title: ItemsStackPanel.FirstVisibleIndex computed incorrectly
body: ItemsStackPanel.FirstVisibleIndex is computed incorrectly in some situations, for example if the ItemsStackPanel is the items panel for an ItemsControl, and the ItemsControl is inside a StackPanel which is inside a ScrollViewer, but the ItemsControl is not the first element in the StackPanel. The calculation seems to assume that the top of the ItemsStackPanel is at the top of the ScrollViewer, and if not the FirstVisibleIndex and LastVisibleIndex properties are completely wrong.
